did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Presbyterian Church (Oaks Corners [Phelps], N.Y.) records, 1804-1915.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One vol. "Statistical Records of the church at Oaks Corners," 1806-28; three vols. of "Session Book" for First Presbyterian Church of Phelps; one vol. trustees minute book, 1805-1851, and annual meeting minutes, 1851-1915; one vol. "Minutes of the Session" of the Phelps church, 1850-1878; one vol. Mabel E. Oaks, Phelpstown Footprints.
